name: CRM Lead Qualification Automation
problem_statement: Sales teams spend 15-20 minutes manually qualifying each incoming lead, resulting in delayed follow-up and missed opportunities. The process involves checking company size, industry fit, budget indicators, and routing to appropriate sales reps.
outcomes: Reduce lead qualification time from 15-20 minutes to under 2 minutes
Increase qualified lead conversion rate by 35%
Automate lead scoring based on 12 qualification criteria
Ensure high-value leads get immediate attention via Slack notifications
roi_notes: Sales team saves 12-15 hours per week on manual qualification. With average deal size of $5K, the 35% improvement in conversion rate generates $50K+ additional monthly revenue for typical SMB using this automation.
security_notes: Handles PII data including names and email addresses. All API communications use HTTPS. Credentials stored in n8n credential store with encryption. No sensitive data logged in plain text.
